tag_list: open-source, cms, content-management-system, microsoft, windows-azure, cloud
overview: I am the CEO and Co-owner of Composite. The company behind the Microsoft based free Open Source CMS, Composite C1. I have been working in the CMS industry for the last 10 years. I am one of the few “mortals” on the team - dealing with everything business related such as strategy, sales and service
